items.title: Turnip & Saffron Risotto
items.descript: Red palm, pumpkin seed, and butternut squash. Topped with sunflower seed crusted portobello and fresh thyme.

items.title: Cheese & Paté
items.descript: Apple white-pepper almond cheese with a pumpkin walnut paté. Served with fresh fruit and pecan crisps.

items.title: Brussel Sprout Salad
items.descript: Shaved brussel sprouts, shredded pumpkin, apples, and pistachios. Served with dehydrated carrots and date sweetened garam masala dressing.

items.title: Spicy Kohlrabi Noodles
items.descript: Noodles in an avocado cream. Accompanied with Thai chili sauce. Topped with sesame seeds and virgin peanuts.

items.title: Pizza
items.descript: Sweet potato and golden flax crust. A sun-dried tomato sauce. Mushroom and almond sausage. With spinach, cashew cheese, and wilted yellow onions.

items.title: Ravioli
items.descript: Rutabaga, chia, and coconut pasta filled with a butternut squash and pine nut cheese. With coconut sage cream sauce, cashew parmesan, and baby kale.

items.title: Falafel
items.descript: Sunflower and carrot falafel wrapped with a pumpkin seed, chia, and flax pita. With cucumber cream, parsley pesto, tomato, and lettuce.

items.title: Pumpkin Curry
items.descript: Potato, sweet potato, pumpkin, butter beans, and kale in a pumpkin seed and tomato curry sauce. Served with brown rice.

items.title: Truffle Mac and Cheese
items.descript: Brown rice pasta, cashew and coconut cheese sauce, spinach, crimini mushrooms, and green peas. Topped with black truffle infused olive oil.

items.title: Peanut Butter Squash
items.descript: Butternut squash, collard greens, black-eyed peas, cabbage, and red quinoa. A maple peanut sauce. Topped with crushed peanuts and fresh thyme.

items.title: Rice and Sea Greens
items.descript: A warm bowl of brown rice topped with a chilled salad of seaweed, spinach, kale, carrots, sesame, sunflower seeds, and avocado. Served with a spinach, lemon, and coconut amino dressing.

items.title: Shredded Root Vegetable Salad
items.descript: Turnip, Carrot, Beet, Rutabaga, cabbage, kale, walnuts and apple. Served with a whole grain mustard, balsamic, and agave dressing.

items.title: garden salad
items.descript: Baby greens, kale, red pepper, cucumber, avocado, carrot, pumpkin seeds, and tomato. Served with a balsamic dressing.

items.title: Pumpkin Cheesecake
items.descript: Cashew, coconut, and pumpkin spices. Drizzled with fresh fruit and local raw honey.

items.title: Beet & Pumpkin Seed Custard
items.descript: Topped with fresh apples and cinnamon white chocolate. Nut Free.

items.title: Ice Cream Sandwich
items.descript: Butternut squash ice cream between two almond ginger snap cookies. Along with a chai tea and cacao sauce.

items.title: Double Chocolate Pecan Torte
items.descript: Avocado and cacao torte topped with a coconut cashew cream and salty cacao nibs.
